title: Ticket #931: Spelling error in InitJobHistoryFile
description:
This should take someone about 30 seconds to fix. It's mildly embarrassing, so we should fix it promptly.

In condor_c++_util/classadHistory.cpp, there is a function called InitJobHistoryFile(). In there is the following line: 

dprintf(D_ALWAYS, "WARNING: History file rotation is disabled and it "
        "may grownq very large.\n");
It should say "grow", not "grownq".
check_ins: 2009-Nov-11 13:07   Check-in [16286]: Spelling fix in log message, #931 (By Matthew Farrellee )
creator: roy
